title: WestRoom
seo_title: WestRoom - NYC Event Venue - WestHouse Hotel New York
seo_description: WestRoom is a private boardroom located on the 23rd floor of WestHouse Hotel, offering seating for up to eight attendees.
contents:
Adjacent to The Terrace on the hotel’s 23rd floor, the Westroom is an intimate boardroom with seating for up to eight. Available exclusively to Resident guests, it is a perfect space for business meetings and private gatherings. Exceptional catering services are easily arranged.

For inquires contact sales@westhousehotelnewyork.com
shortdescrp: Intimate boardroom with seating for up to eight
